name: A Single Radish
description:
~A SINGLE RADISH~
A short puzzle adventure

Use the energy giving powers of the radish to escape each room.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Spacebar to move through the wordsy bits

NOTE: This also currently has the common HTML5 issue of losing focus if clicking outside the game window. I have researched some potential ways to solve this, but was not aware before doing the final submission. Hopefully I can find a way to fix this in the post-jam update.

FEATURING:

  1. 10+ Levels of Exciting-esque, adventure-like puzzle situations
  2. Many action-packed actions to perform using the power of controlling
  3. A fully voice acted campaign
  4. Quite a lot of radishes, overall
  5. Roughly Five (5) entire minutes of your precious earth-time of gamer-tainment

-----

INSPIRED BY THE FOLLOWING VERY TRUE FACT:

https://factbot.tumblr.com/post/161731617616
-----

Made for Go Godot Jam 2 in November 2021

THEME: Energy Source

-----

All code, art, and sounds/music are by me. The fonts are VERY NOT by me and are made by the following talented font-smiths.

FONTS USED:

04b_30 by Yuji Oshimotohttp://www.04.jp.org/

code 8x8 by Juan Casco
https://www.juancasco.net/

-----

Thank you so much for playing!
